## Repository Information

**Repository:** rajavijayach/awesome-product-management
**URL:** https://github.com/rajavijayach/awesome-product-management
**Category/Focus:** PM resources directory - smaller list but still relevant

## Submission Details

### Target Audience
Product Managers exploring PM resources and tools. Smaller community but targeted audience.

### Positioning/Pitch
PM-Skills provides production-ready AI workflows for every stage of product development, from discovery to iteration.

### Relevant Section
Will depend on their structure - likely:
- "Tools"
- "Resources"
- "Frameworks"

### Submission Content

**Title/Name:**
```
PM-Skills
```

**Description:**
```markdown
24 AI-powered PM workflows for product teams. Generate professional PRDs, user stories, hypotheses, A/B tests, and retrospectives using proven frameworks (Triple Diamond, JTBD, OST). Includes workflow bundles for Feature Kickoff and Lean Startup. Works with Claude, GitHub Copilot, Cursor.
```

**Link:**
```
https://github.com/product-on-purpose/pm-skills
```

## Notes

Smaller list but still a relevant PM audience. Keep description concise and impact-focused.

Emphasize:
- **24 skills** - comprehensive coverage
- **AI-powered** - modern PM practice
- **Proven frameworks** - not experimental
- **Workflow bundles** - end-to-end processes
- **Open source** - freely available

Lower priority than larger lists but worth submitting for additional distribution.
